Author: lovelylayout
Text: That's about .375 pounds per day or 2.6 pounds per week. If your starting weight was high it could be normal, but if your starting weight was already in the healthy range, that's a fairly fast rate of weight loss. The typical advised healthy rate of loss is 1-2 pounds per week IIRC.

Author: Competitive-Basket
Text: What is “normal” is for one person may not be another person. This is something you need to speak with your GP about as they know your medical history.
